create_wallet_error.string: Please reopen the app and try again.

create_wallet_mnemonic_restore_error.string: Please double-check if your recovery phrase is accurate.

send_address_placeholder.string: Enter a Bitcoin or Lightning invoice or address

send_clipboard_empty_text.string: Please copy an address or an invoice.

description.string: The maximum spendable amount is a bit lower due to a required reserve balance.

send_dialog1.string: It appears you are sending over $100. Do you want to continue?

send_dialog2.string: It appears you are sending over 50% of your total balance. Do you want to continue?

send_dialog3.string: The transaction fee appears to be over 50% of the amount you are sending. Do you want to continue?

send_dialog4.string: The transaction fee appears to be over $10. Do you want to continue?

send_dialog5_description.string: Current network conditions require that your fee should be greater than {minimumFee} ₿/vbyte. This transaction may fail, take a while to confirm, or get trimmed from the mempool. Do you wish to proceed?

send_pending_note.string: This payment is taking a bit longer than expected. You can continue using Bitkit.

send_error_slash_ln.string: Unfortunately contact could not be paid instantly. You can try a regular payment (more expensive, slower).

send_error_create_tx.string: Unable to broadcast the transaction. Please try again.

tag_remove_error_description.string: Bitkit was unable to find the transaction data.

error_no_tx_title.string: No transaction is available to broadcast.

error_no_tx_msg.string: Please check your transaction info and try again.

error_min_fee_msg.string: Please increase your fee and try again.

send_amount_error_balance.string: The amount is greater than your current balance.

send_amount_error_fee.string: The amount indicated does not allow a fee to be included.

max_possible_fee_rate_msg.string: Lower the custom fee and try again.

min_possible_fee_rate_msg.string: Increase the custom fee and try again.

send_output_to_small_description.string: Please increase your send amount to proceed.

send_coin_selection_output_to_small_desc.string: Please remove UTXO's or increase your send amount to proceed.

send_fee_error_min.string: Unable to decrease the fee any further.

tags_add_error_description.string: Bitkit was unable to find the transaction data.

toast_payment_success_description.string: Your instant payment was sent successfully.

toast_payment_failed_description.string: Your instant payment failed. Please try again.

receive_connect_initial.string: To set up your spending balance, a <accent>{networkFee}</accent> network fee and <accent>{serviceFee}</accent> service provider fee will be deducted.

receive_connect_additional.string: To receive more instant Bitcoin, Bitkit has to increase your liquidity. A <accent>{networkFee}</accent> network fee and <accent>{serviceFee}</accent> service provider fee will be deducted from the amount you specified.

text.string:
Your Spending Balance uses the Lightning Network to make your payments cheaper, faster, and more private.

This works like internet access, but you pay for liquidity & routing instead of bandwidth.

This setup includes some one-time costs.

text_additional.string:
Your Spending Balance uses the Lightning Network to make your payments cheaper, faster, and more private.

This works like internet access, but you pay for liquidity & routing instead of bandwidth.

Bitkit needs to increase the receiving capacity of your spending balance to process this payment.

receive_cjit_error_msg.string: Failed to send funds to your spending account.

activity_no_explain.string: Receive some funds to get started

activity_error_get_description.string: Bitkit was not able to fetch the transaction data.

activity_removed_msg.string: Please check your activity list. The {count} impacted transaction(s) will be highlighted in red.

boost_error_msg.string: Bitkit was unable to boost the transaction.

boost_fee_custom.string: Your transaction may settle faster if you include an additional network fee. Set your custom fee below.

boost_fee_recomended.string: Your transaction may settle faster if you include an additional network fee. Here is a recommendation:

error_create_tx_msg.string: An error occurred. Please try again {raw}

error_broadcast_tx_msg.string: An error occurred when broadcasting your transaction. {raw}

error_broadcast_tx_connection.string:
Please check your connection and try again.
{message}

reorg_msg_begin.string: {count, plural, one {# of your transactions is no longer confirmed.} other {# of your transactions are no longer confirmed.}} Please wait.

reorg_msg_end.string: Please check your activity list for affected transactions.

lnurl_w_text.string: The funds you withdraw will be deposited into your Bitkit spending balance.

description.string: The minimum amount for this invoice is ₿ {amount}.

balance_hidden_message.string: Swipe your wallet balance to reveal it again.

balance_unit_switched_message.string: Tap your wallet balance to switch it back to {unit}.

refresh_error_msg.string: An error occurred and couldn't refresh the wallet. Please try again.

refresh_error_throttle_description.string: Electrum server connection is throttled. Please wait several minutes before trying again.

receive_insufficient_text.string: Insufficient receiving capacity to receive this amount over Lightning.

receive_foreground_title.developer_comment: This message appears when the user is shown an LN invoice but tries to switch to another app

receive_foreground_msg.string: Payments to your spending balance might fail if you switch between apps.
receive_foreground_msg.developer_comment: This message appears when the user is shown an LN invoice but tries to switch to another app
